summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6695 for the improvement of 33rd Ave. S. from approximately 280 feet north of S. Graham St. to approximately 260 feet North of S. Raymond St.; and certain other streets, avenues and an alley; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance 107140, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
